title: BaseHistoryType
description: Basic type that contains all properties common to a person's profile history entry - intended for use in education history, employment history or military history.

start.description: The start date of the history if known.

end.description: The end date of the history if known.

current.description: Indicator that the person's history entry is currently active (i.e. if education, still at the school. If work history, still working at the organization)

attachmentReferences.description: Attachment references supporting the history entry.

descriptions.description: Additional details or descriptions about the history entry.
